conclusion: Derogation of Art. 5-3 satisfies the requirements of Art. 15;No violation of Art. 5-5;No violation of Art. 13
docname: CASE OF BRANNIGAN AND McBRIDE v. THE UNITED KINGDOM - [Russian Translation]
